wikipedia_page.main: Edward Gleadall (died 1993, in Sheffield) was an English professional football winger. He played in the Football League for Bury and Scunthorpe & Lindsay United.Gleadall joined Bury, making his debut in the 1951–52 season. He left in March 1957, joining Scunthorpe & Lindsay United.On leaving Scunthorpe he joined Weymouth. He joined Mossley in 1959, leaving at the end the 1959–50 season.
